title: Microsoft | SDE 2 (L61) | Bangalore
content:
**Compensation details :**

Education: B.Tech in Non-CS Tier 1
Years of Experience: 3 years 3 months
Current role: Senior Software engineer at Big US MNC
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE II, L61
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 25 Lakhs
Relocation: 2.8 Lakhs
Signing Bonus: None
Joining Stock compensation: $55K stock grant vested over 4 years (~11.5 Lakhs per year)
Performance Bonus : 0-20% of salary ~ 2.5 Lakhs (assuming 10% for 1st Yr)
Stock bonus : Performance based stock rewards every year, assuming ~$12K stock vested over 5 years = ~2L for first year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 25L + 2.5L + 2L + 11.5L = ~41 Lakhs first year (not including relocation)
Benefits: Standard Microsoft benefits

Current compensation : 
Base - 17.8 L
Annual bonus - 1.7L
Stock compensation is fixed stock units, 195 stock units will vest next year -  195 X 186 (current stock price) X 84 (usd-inr) = ~30L
Total compensation for next year - 17.8 + 1.7 + 30 = ~50L
Current compensation is heavily dominated by stock units


Other details: Tried to negotiate, asked for $100K stock grant instead of 55K but rejected. They are open to hear reasonable increase request for stock grant. 

What do you guys think about the offer? Base and bonus are higher than current however stock compensation is on the lower side.
